item.title: #of players and server owner trouble
item.dc:creator: @texis11 texis11
item.description:
@texis11 wrote:

Here is your error:

sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664);

It should be sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players"", 6664);

Hope this works for you, it works for me on PimpScape

Read full topic

item.title: #of players and server owner trouble
item.dc:creator: @We_PlAy We PlAy
item.description:
@We_PlAy wrote:

For my server i added the code and i double checked and it is completly right. Then i compiled it and there were no errors but then when i went on my server it wasnt there. Can someone help me?

Code I enetered:

//Playercount and server name at top of screen
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@red@~@whi@G@red@l@gre@0@cya@R@whi@Y@red@S@gre@c@cya@a@whi@p@red@e@whi@P@gre@K", 6570);
sendFrame126("@yel@Owner=@whi@Blade0fGl0ry", 6572);
sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673

And i added right under:

public void println(String str) {
//System.out.println("[client-"+playerId+"-"+playerName+"]: "+str);

which is at the top of the client.java on testscape

can someone plz help me out and tell me if i did something wrong? because i cant get it to work
